thread.title: Jiri Vesely beats Gerald Melzer to reach 2nd round in Vienna
thread.title_full: Jiri Vesely beats Gerald Melzer to reach 2nd round in Vienna

title: Jiri Vesely beats Gerald Melzer to reach 2nd round in Vienna
text:
Jiri Vesely beats Gerald Melzer; joins fellow Czechs Stepanek, Rosol in 2nd round in Vienna THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   12:33 pmLast   12:34 pm   
People: 
Austria (29) 

VIENNA — Jiri Vesely of Czech Republic defeated Austrian wildcard entry Gerald Melzer of Austria 6-4, 6-3 on the opening day of the Erste Bank Open on Monday. 
The 40th-ranked Vesely dropped serve once in the opening set on the only break point he faced. He will next play second-seeded Kevin Anderson or Andreas Haider-Maurer of Austria. 
Radek Stepanek won another Czech-Austrian duel, beating Dennis Novak 6-4, 6-3, while Lukas Rosol became the third Czech player to advance after defeating Yuichi Sugita of Japan 6-4, 7-6 (2). 
Also, Ernests Gulbis of Latvia ended his five-match losing streak by defeating Austrian qualifier Lucas Miedler 6-3, 2-6, 6-3. 
The 522nd-ranked Miedler appeared in his first main-draw match on ATP level.
